name: Blueberry French Toast In A Mug Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: bread, egg, milk, cinnamon, vanilla extract, blueberry, maple syrup
recipeInstructionSteps: In a bowl, add egg, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla, and mix.
In a microwave-safe mug, place half of the cubed bread and desired amount of blueberries.
Place the rest of the bread, berries, and the egg mixture into the mug.
Microwave for 1½ minutes or until egg is fully cooked.
